T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait 
PSA 3
$800 (Net to me)
Will Ship Insured w/ Signature Confirmation

I've never done any transactions through here before, and am just now starting to collect other vintage cards (bought mostly Mantle, through eBay and the major auction houses). You can contact me on email [url]longley_brian@yahoo.com[/url]. Let me know if still available. Thanks! Brian
